CodeBlockMethod.Name: BuildOnGround
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
-- 현재 맵에 건물 건설 -- 원래는 맵에 건물 관리 프로퍼티가 있었음... => tag로 관리하도록 변경
local Name = Info[1] local ModelId = Info[2] local FinalPositon = Info[3] local Scale = Info[4] local KoreanName = Info[5] self.FlipX = Info[6]
local MapEntity = self.Entity
--local Building = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(ModelId, Name .. math.floor(self.index), Vector3(FinalPositon.x, FinalPositon.y, 0), MapEntity, nil) local Building = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(ModelId, Name, Vector3(FinalPositon.x, FinalPositon.y, 0), MapEntity, nil) Building.Building.KoreanName = KoreanName
self.index = self.index + 1
